tool_description: apimail10 is an API service that provides temporary email addresses for users to receive emails without revealing their personal email addresses.

api_list.name: Current Mail
api_list.description: Fetches the current mail associated with the temporary email address.

api_list.name: getNewEmail10
api_list.description: Generates a new temporary email address.

api_list.name: ReadMail
api_list.description: Retrieves the content of an email using its unique mail ID.

required_parameters.name: mailid
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the email to be read.
